summary: Development in ReactJS, AngularJS and Typescript of an application to help host manage clients in casino.

Development of the front-end application for the project Navig’Option (subscription online of life insurance). Development in AngularJS and Typescript. Collaboration with the team in charge of the REST API. Participation on the technical choices. Working with agile methodology (SCRUM).
Development of features for Kering (tool for managing orders). Development in Javascript and PHP.
Working with an agile team (SCRUM). Participation to the development of pagejaunes.fr. Work on multiple API (Java / Spring), and on the front-end modules (Symfony 3).
Maintaining applications on internals projects. Evolving apps, fixing bugs, setting up tests, and pushing apps to server in production. Development in Java and Spring.

Participation to the development of Youslide (web app for interactive presentation online) Developing software with MeteorJS. Working with an agile team (SCRUM). Conception and realization of features for the app and setting up functionals tests.
Conception and development of a website for two therapists. Development in PHP.
